remarks: ` G ` is a function.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Apr-2020.)
statement:
etransclem39.p $e |- ( ph -> P e. NN ) $.
etransclem39.m $e |- ( ph -> M e. NN0 ) $.
etransclem39.f $e |- F = ( x e. RR |-> ( ( x ^ ( P - 1 ) ) x. prod_ j e. ( 1 ... M ) ( ( x - j ) ^ P ) ) ) $.
etransclem39.g $e |- G = ( x e. RR |-> sum_ i e. ( 0 ... R ) ( ( ( RR Dn F ) ` i ) ` x ) ) $.
etransclem39 $p |- ( ph -> G : RR --> CC ) $.
$d M j x $.
$d P j x $.
$d R i j x $.
$d i j ph x $.
